page.title: 09The Post Office
page.content: The Post Office is in the middle of Ebchester.It is a shop as well as a Post Office.Mr.& Mrs Hall own the shop but he is the Post Office agent.The Post Office has been in Ebchester for a long time.Mr.Hall has been here for 18 months. He gets up at 6 o'clock in the morning to do the papers.He works seven hours a day,6 days a week.His bisiest day is Thursday because the pensions are given out,30-40 people are unemployed in Ebchester.Mr.Hall employs 4 people,they are all part time.Up to 300 people visit the shop daily but not all use the Post Office.
